channel.title: Monitoring on Eric's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Monitoring on Eric's Blog

item.title: Review: 1 year with LogicMonitor
item.description: Disclaimer: This is unsolicited feedback. These are my own opinions and not those of my employer. Terminology: I know I’ve been lacking this in some of my other blogs posts, so here’s a stab at trying to make sure you have a rough idea of what certain words mean. LM: Acronym I user for LogicMonitor Collector: Its a windows or linux box that grabs the data you want monitored from your other servers.
